selectWorld.trulyrandom.info: Choose which modules to include in the randomization, these can be toggled in game, so don't worry if you set one you don't like.
selectWorld.trulyrandom.block_models.too: Randomises the models of blocks that share the same shape and states.
selectWorld.trulyrandom.loot_tables.tool: Randomises the loot tables of blocks, entities, chests and more.
selectWorld.trulyrandom.recipes.tooltip: Randomises the crafting recipes of items.
selectWorld.trulyrandom.structures.toolt: Randomises the structures that generate in the world. (i.e village can be a stronghold, etc.)
selectWorld.trulyrandom.seed.title: Seed:
selectWorld.trulyrandom.seed.tooltip: Seed that will be used to determine the randomization.
